title: Landing Home Page Load
description: Verify that the Home page loads correctly displaying the school overview and introduction content.

steps.description: Navigate to the Home page URL
Check that the school overview and introduction text are visible
Verify that all visuals and layout elements of the Home page render properly

title: Access Online Admission Application Form
description: Ensure the admission application form can be accessed and all required fields are present.

steps.description: Navigate to the Admissions page
Open the application form
Verify all mandatory fields (e.g., applicant name, date of birth, contact details) are displayed and editable

title: Successful Online Admission Form Submission
description: Test that a prospective student can submit the admission application form with valid data and receive confirmation.

steps.description: Complete all required fields in the admission application form with valid data
Submit the admission application form
Check that the form submission succeeds and a confirmation message is displayed
Verify that the submitted application appears in Admissions Manager for review

title: Admission Form Validation - Mandatory Fields
description: Verify that the admission form validates mandatory fields and prevents submission if they are empty or invalid.

steps.description: Open the admission application form
Leave required fields empty or enter invalid data formats
Attempt to submit the form
Verify that the system prevents submission and displays appropriate error messages next to each invalid or empty field

title: Review and Manage Applications in Admissions Manager
description: Test that admission administrators can view, approve, and reject applications via the Admissions Manager interface.

steps.description: Log in as an admission administrator
Navigate to Admissions Manager
Verify the list of submitted applications is displayed with relevant details
Select an application and approve it
Confirm the application status updates to approved
Select another application and reject it
Confirm the application status updates to rejected

title: Fee Payment Tracking - Record New Payment
description: Verify that bursar can record a fee payment correctly and the payment status updates accordingly.

steps.description: Log in as bursar
Navigate to the Finance Manager
Select a student and add a new fee payment with valid details
Verify the payment is recorded and payment status for the student updates accordingly

title: Manage Fee Structure - Add and Update Fee Types
description: Ensure bursar can add new fee types and update existing fee structures properly.

steps.description: Log in as bursar
Navigate to Fee Structure management
Add a new fee type with all required attributes
New fee type appears in the fee structure list
Edit an existing fee type’s amount
Verify the fee structure is updated and saved

title: Student Record Management - Create, Read, Update, Delete
description: Test CRUD operations on student records including data accuracy and UI reflection.

steps.description: Log in as administrator
Navigate to Student Manager
Create a new student record with valid data
Confirm new student appears correctly in listing
Update student's details
Verify the update is reflected in the student record
Delete a student record
Confirm the student record is removed from the system

title: Digital ID Generation for Students
description: Verify that digital student IDs are generated correctly and accessible within the Student Manager.

steps.description: Open a student’s record in Student Manager
Trigger digital ID generation
Verify that a digital ID is generated and displayed accurately

title: Student Data Import - Valid File
description: Test that importing student data with a properly formatted file loads student records correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to Student Manager
Import student data from a valid formatted file
Verify the student records from file are present and correct in the system

title: Student Data Import - Invalid File Format
description: Verify the system handles import failure gracefully when uploading an invalid or corrupted student data file.

steps.description: Attempt to import student data from an invalid or corrupted file
Verify an error message is shown and no corrupt data is imported

title: Parent Portal Login and Notification Access
description: Ensure that parents can login and view notifications and announcements properly on the portal.

steps.description: Log in to Parent Portal with valid credentials
Verify the notifications and announcements are displayed and readable

title: Submit Leave Request via Parent Portal
description: Test that a parent can submit a leave request and is given a confirmation.

steps.description: Log in to Parent Portal
Navigate to the leave request submission form
Fill in leave request details with valid input
Submit the leave request
Check that submission confirmation is shown

title: Leave Request Processing in Leave Requests Manager
description: Verify that administrators can access, approve, and reject leave requests properly.

steps.description: Log in as an administrator
Navigate to Leave Requests Manager
Verify the list of leave requests is displayed with details
Approve a leave request
Verify the leave request status updates to approved
Reject another leave request
Verify the leave request status updates to rejected

title: Automated Email Notification on Admission Submission
description: Confirm that the system automatically sends an email notification upon successful admission form submission.

steps.description: Submit a valid admission application form
Verify that an automated email notification is sent to the applicant’s email address

title: Automated Email Notification on Leave Request Submission
description: Verify the system sends an email notification to administrators when a new leave request is submitted.

steps.description: Submit a leave request from the Parent Portal
Confirm an email notification is automatically sent to the relevant administrator(s)

title: Email Delivery Failure Handling
description: Test how the system handles failures in sending automated emails and whether retry or alert mechanisms work.

steps.description: Simulate email sending failure (e.g., invalid email address or service outage)
Verify that the system retries or logs the failure and provides alerts to administrators
